item.title: Radini add a quote by Sue Grafton
item.description: "Ghosts don't haunt us. That's not how it works. They're present among us because we won't let go of them." -- Sue Grafton

item.title: Radini add a quote by Rhonda Byrne
item.description: "Absolutely everything you experience in your life is a result of what you have given in your thoughts and feelings, whether you realize you have given them or not." -- Rhonda Byrne

item.title: Radini add a quote by Rhonda Byrne
item.description: "What you feel about another person, what you think or say about another person, what you do to another person â€“ you do to you. Give judgment and criticism and you give it to yourself. Give love and appreciation to another person or anything, and you give it to yourself." -- Rhonda Byrne

item.title: Radini add a quote by Rhonda Byrne
item.description: "Start telling the story of your amazing life, and the law of attraction must make sure you receive it!" -- Rhonda Byrne
